text: Methyloferula is a Gram-negative, mesophilic, psychrotolerant, aerobic and colorless genus of bacteria from the family of Beijerinckiaceae. Up to now there is only one species of this genus known (Methyloferula stellata). == Further reading == * * * ==References== Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera Category:Beijerinckiaceae
title: Methyloferula
